channel.title: [PI]Deception
channel.description:
[quote="E z Range"]Updated a bit of the source/client, the new cache should autodownload through the client.
If you need a seperate cache link tell me.[/quote]
Download links are at the bottom.
I give Nintendo 99% of the credit for this server. I Played DSPK and loved it, me and Two other people from DSPK Messed around with the source. I worked on the server for a short period of time, and decided to stop. I Started with the DSPK Source Nintendo released.
Pictures/Gifs -
[img]http://img153.imageshack.us/img153/7679/vestalongandstatgif.gif[/img] [img]http://img577.imageshack.us/img577/7849/clawsandags.gif[/img] [img]http://img195.imageshack.us/img195/5300/presentssss.gif[/img] Caskets, Mystery Boxes and Presents Provide Random Items!(The Item names are named differently now) [img]http://img156.imageshack.us/img156/412/magicboxx.gif[/img] Magic Boxes provide you with runes, so you dont waste your time(Now named box of runes) [img]http://img687.imageshack.us/img687/8393/moneybaggg.gif[/img] If you have over max cash, use a cash bag to store your spare cash! [img]http://img266.imageshack.us/img266/7247/555ni.png[/img] [img]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/1260/lolqxz.png[/img] [img]http://img64.imageshack.us/img64/1661/failssss.png[/img] [img]http://img375.imageshack.us/img375/7974/chaotics.gif[/img] [img]http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/735/autocast.gif[/img] [img]http://img97.imageshack.us/img97/6079/switching.gif[/img]
Source - [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?h15gddu754i648f]Deception Source.rar[/url] Client V2 - [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?97d8kuh616ucu12]Deception Client.rar[/url] Cache - Should be auto-downloading via the client. (Feel free to use any gifs above, or message me and ill try and make one if needed.) (If any links go down, post and ill re-upload them.) (I know the pictures look terrible, but i dont really care, if you dont like it, dont use it.)

item.title: [PI]Deception
item.dc:creator: @CodeTM CodeTM
item.description:
@CodeTM wrote:

My name is Sara,
I really love your server, it seems very pretty than the other servers.
I’ve just one problem if you could help me, i would be very happy.

could you send me the Chache of Deception? Somehow its not loading everything into the C:/drive , its erroring
when something runs into the chache, auto download from client into the chache. i dont know why.
it says " error loading…Please Report " i dont know why… i’ve removed the chache many times and re-tried still didnt load the chache. i’ve checked the signlink folder and looked where its gonna download the chache. But still…
if you could please send me the chache i would appreciate that.
Or help me to fix it…

Your Sarah.

Read full topic

[/quote]hardcoded items always show up as long as the ints, model header, and the model is added in the cache. All you have to do server sided is to add it to item.cfg[/quote]
sorry that wasn’t clear i meant commands

item.title: [PI]Deception
item.dc:creator: @Eqo Eqo
item.description:
@Eqo wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:129, topic:378960”][quote author=Eqo link=topic=474816.msg3852698#msg3852698 date=1324153213]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=474816.msg3852689#msg3852689 date=1324152917]

Make a folder in your C:\ drive called “intdubpkcache”
Using Winrar, extract the files in the .rar file to the folder you just created.
If you are getting some error loading please report or some Sorry an error occurred whilst loading Deception then just search for IntDubPk’s client and download the cache from it. They are both the same and it will work.
[/quote]He could also refer to my client error manual here:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,493694.0.html

could you help me ? is this a 508 server ?
[/quote]what is the problem? and no this is a 317[/quote]
well i’m trying to find and ID list for the source but none of the chaotics are coming up in them ?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Deception
item.dc:creator: @JustChillBro JustChillBro
item.description:
@JustChillBro wrote:

For everyone who needs the cache link,
Client>CacheDownloader.java
Copy the uppit link in there and just add a “p” at the end so it spells zip lol.
Great release! I may use this as a base for my Pk Server.

Read full topic
